desc: This APP has the following elements;1. B2C - User Model2. Customer is using something ie hiring - something of the clients for a time specific period for a fee.3. Revenue sharing the fee - so ability for admin to split % at back end.4. Viewable bay all parties on map at all times so if client leaves the area he can still get back to the service area with the item,5. Alarm when time is up or at increments before hand.6. Penalty charges if customer doesn't return in the time agreed and allotted.7. Credit Card processing approvals also terms allowing us to hold $ it client doesn't return item back in time.'8. Credit Card facility allows for us to release pending hold if client does return.9. Terms of Use, contact us10. Reviews - stars and comments ability for both to post11. Social media integration - facebook, twitter12. A user can tap his smartphone and text or call hirer at his location to extend service time.13. The hirer has the option to accept or reject or post additional charge where hiree can accept.14. If hiree accepts the extension, details are sent to the customer along with time extension allowed.15. The hirer can track the hiree his location at all times.16. The hirer can also track the exact location of the customer and reach his service location.17. The payment procedure is handled by USE.18. Business model had a rating system in place for hirers and hirees right from beginning, hirer and hirree can rate each other after the service has been provided.
title: Design/Build/Launch APP

desc: Hi!We are in the process of creating a project that has as main objective evaluate the development level of leadership competencies through the responding to a video sequence and the reading of brain activity using a EEG device: Muse 2017.We have already created the back-end area of this project, where business customers are created, as well as all the competency models and video sequences.What we need now  is an application that will reside on client devices. It can be solely android or unity (we'd need a budget for both options). This app will login the customer and the final user, present her the evaluation sequences (one for each competency model), ask questions and in the meantime read the information that is sent by Muse. At the end we have to present to the final user a report with her score on each competency plus how her levels of stress, attention and focus were during each step of the testing.Please bear in mind that we are working with MUSE 2017
title: Create a client application that communicates with Muse

Ids of gateway will be hard coded in the app, we will make it dynamic in a future evolution).We need this app very fast and are ready to give 25% bonus if you can finish it in record time :)
